co.cask.coopr.store.credential

Class EncryptedCredentialStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      • co.cask.coopr.store.credential.EncryptedCredentialStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CredentialStore, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MemcachedCredentialStore, SQLCredentialStore

    public abstract class EncryptedCredentialStore
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
implements CredentialStore
    Abstract base for implementations of CredentialStore that encrypt values before storing in whatever the storage engine is.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
